subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Patrick White and tailback Steve Slaton helped give West Virginia a victory over Pittsburgh that left the Mountaineers a half-game behind first-place Rutgers in the Big East standings.
snippet: Quarterback Patrick White and tailback Steve Slaton helped give West Virginia a victory over Pittsburgh that left the Mountaineers a half-game behind first-place Rutgers in the Big East standings.
